revised_title: Investigations on the Nature and Combinations of Oxymuriatic and Muriatic Acids
tldr: The author examines the nature and combinations of oxymuriatic and muriatic acids, questioning the presence of oxygen in oxymuriatic acid and exploring the properties of various compounds formed by these acids. The study includes experiments on the decomposition of muriatic acid and the formation of new compounds, such as muriatic ether.
